dcterms:description: A novel benchmark for evaluating Vision Relationship Hallucination, featuring image-level and instance-level questions that assess local visual comprehension.
dcterms:title: R-Bench

dcterms:creator: H. Agrawal
K. Desai
Y. Wang
X. Chen
R. Jain
M. Johnson
D. Batra
D. Parikh
S. Lee
P. N. Anderson
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for novel object captioning at scale, providing a validation set used in the construction of R-Bench.
dcterms:title: nocaps

dcterms:creator: T.-Y. Lin
M. Maire
S. Belongie
J. Hays
P. Perona
D. Ramanan
P. Doll√°r
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides a large-scale collection of images with object annotations, used to create a comprehensive relationship set for R-Bench.
dcterms:title: COCO

dcterms:creator: A. Kuznetsova
H. Rom
N. Alldrin
J. Uijlings
I. Krasin
J. Pont-Tuset
S. Kamali
S. Popov
M. Malloci
A. Kolesnikov
dcterms:description: A dataset that unifies image classification, object detection, and visual relationship detection at scale, providing images used in the nocaps dataset.
dcterms:title: OpenImages

dcterms:creator: R. Krishna
Y. Zhu
O. Groth
J. Johnson
K. Hata
J. Kravitz

Y. Kalantidis
L.-J. Li

dcterms:description: A dataset that connects language and vision using crowdsourced dense image annotations, which has been used in pre-training or visual instruction tuning across many LVLMs.
dcterms:title: Visual Genome
